hero_subtitle: Full stack developer focused on web experiences and microservices.
about_text: I am a full stack developer with hands-on experience at ControlT, El Creativo Web and Diseños y Modas Ca y Ka, leading digital transformation and logistics solutions. I craft modern interfaces with Vue, React and Angular; build APIs and microservices with Node.js, .NET and Java; and run CI/CD pipelines with Docker and AWS. I love turning complex challenges into scalable, secure and delightful products.
